slots.description: menu items to be listed in the menu

members.name: childRole
members.description:
Hide this getter from web-component-analyzer until
https://github.com/runem/web-component-analyzer/issues/131
has been addressed.

members.name: onFocusableItemAddedOrUpdated
members.description:
When a descendant `<sp-menu-item>` element is added or updated it will dispatch
this event to announce its presence in the DOM. During the capture phase the first
Menu based element that the event encounters will manage the focus state of the
dispatching `<sp-menu-item>` element.

members.name: onSelectableItemAddedOrUpdated
members.description:
When a descendant `<sp-menu-item>` element is added or updated it will dispatch
this event to announce its presence in the DOM. During the bubble phase the first
Menu based element that the event encounters that does not inherit selection will
manage the selection state of the dispatching `<sp-menu-item>` element.

events.name: change
events.description: Announces that the `value` of the element has changed

attributes.description: whether the element has a specific selection algorithm that it applies to its item descendants. `single` allows only one descendent to be selected at a time. `multiple` allows many descendants to be selected. `inherit` will be applied dynamically when an ancestor of this element is actively managing the selection of its descendents. When the `selects` attribute is not present a `value` will not be maintained and the Menu Item children of this Menu will not have their `selected` state managed.
attributes.name: selects

slots.description: menu items to be listed in the group

When a descendant `<sp-menu-item>` element is added or updated it will dispatch
this event to announce its presence in the DOM. During the capture phase the first
Menu based element that the event encounters will manage the focus state of the
dispatching `<sp-menu-item>` element.

members.description:
When a descendant `<sp-menu-item>` element is added or updated it will dispatch
this event to announce its presence in the DOM. During the bubble phase the first
Menu based element that the event encounters that does not inherit selection will
manage the selection state of the dispatching `<sp-menu-item>` element.

attributes.description: whether the element has a specific selection algorithm that it applies to its item descendants. `single` allows only one descendent to be selected at a time. `multiple` allows many descendants to be selected. `inherit` will be applied dynamically when an ancestor of this element is actively managing the selection of its descendents. When the `selects` attribute is not present a `value` will not be maintained and the Menu Item children of this Menu will not have their `selected` state managed.
attributes.name: selects

events.name: change
events.description: Announces that the `value` of the element has changed

slots.description: text content to display within the Menu Item
icon element to be placed at the start of the Menu Item
slots.name: icon

slots.description: content placed at the end of the Menu Item like values, keyboard shortcuts, etc.
slots.name: value

members.name: handleSubmenuChange
members.description:
When there is a `change` event in the submenu for this item
then we "click" this item to cascade the selection up the
menu tree allowing all submenus between the initial selection
and the root of the tree to have their selection changes and
be closed.

events.description: announces the item has been added so a parent menu can take ownerships
events.name: sp-menu-item-added

events.description: announces when removed from the DOM so the parent menu can remove ownership and update selected state
events.name: sp-menu-item-removed
